content: leg 1 by single_crochet in to the last round of leg1 single_crochet 7 more times across leg 1 total 8sc until you reach the chain 1 section make increase in to the front loop of that chain then 8sc across the leg 2 increase in to the front loop of chain 1 section 20 r2-4 - 20 single_crochet r5 - 4sc 1dec 8sc 1dec 4sc 18 r6 - 18sc place stitch marker between 6st and 7th rounds here you will sew the arms r7 - single_crochet decrease x6 12 put stuffing in the body part r8 - 6dec 6 head don t cut yarn just keep crocheting r9 - 6inc 12 r10 - 12inc 24 r11-14 - 24sc r15 - 2sc 1dec x6 18 place safety pin eyes between 13 and 14 rounds on the front part of a cat put stuffing in the head r16 - 1sc 1dec x6 12 r17 - 6dec 6 put a little bit more stuffing cut yarn leaving a long tail 15 cm/6inch long to close the remaining gap use a tapestry needle to sew the yarn tail through the front loops of each stitch in a clockwise order tighten the loops wave the ends hands r1- with a white yarn 6sc in to the magic_ring r2-6 -6sc 10 r7 - slip_stitch in to the first st of the round put stuffing in the hand cut yarn leaving a long tail 15 cm/6inch long to close the remaining gap use a tapestry needle flatter the hand and sew for photos i use a different colour yarn crochet 2 identical hands using remaining tails sew hands to the sides of the body where you already place the stitch marker between 6st and 7th rounds of the body weave the ends ears crochet 2 identical ears starting with a white yarn r1- leaving a 10cm tail ch5 turn your work r2 - single_crochet in to the 2nd chain from the hook 3 more single_crochet ch1 turn work r3 - single_crochet decrease single_crochet ch1 turn work r4 - dec3 ch1 cut yarn and tight the loop by pulling the tail weave that tail using the 10cm/4inch tail sew ears on top of the head and in the middle of sides nose using sewing needle and a pink sewing thread make 3 stitches for nose and a mouth bonnet body part of a bonnet r1 - using main colour blue for blueberry and red for cherry tomato and strawberry chain 29 turn work r2 - slip_stitch in to the 2nd chain from the hook slip_stitch 2sc 2hdc 16dc 2hdc 2sc 1slst ch1 turn work r3 -
